posts.title: The Pillow For People With Glasses
posts.content: The pillow for people with glasses is your ticket to relaxing in total comfort without having to remove your spectacles. Its contoured design provides support without inhibiting vision or causing uncomfortable pressure on the side of your head, face, or nose.

posts.title: Sealing Soda Can Lid
posts.content: Keep your tasty pop from going stale too soon with help form this sealing soda can lid. Apart from minimizing the risk of spills, it keeps pesky insects from flying into your drink, while also helping your carbonated beverage last 58% longer than normal.

posts.title: MVMT Watches
posts.content: Remain as dapper as ever without breaking the bank by accessorizing with one of these MVMT watches. This affordable yet fashion forward collection offers a wide selection of high end watch faces and interchangeable straps that you can mix and match.

posts.title: Cockroach Plush Pillow
posts.content: Make your bedroom cozier than ever with a little roach infestation. These cockroach plush pillows feature an ultra soft plush interior and a disturbingly realistic design that is guaranteed to send chills down your spine as you snuggle with them.

posts.title: Temperature Adjustable Coffee Mug
posts.content: Keep your succulent roast in prime drinking condition by pouring it into this adjustable temperature coffee mug. This sleek high-tech mug allows you to adjust the temperature by rotating the base so that your drink remains piping hot for hours.

posts.title: The Ladder Stabilizer
posts.content: Avoid serious injury while doing handywork around the house by placing the ladder stabilizer underneath your ladder. This versatile all-terrain tool is crafted from 14 gauge powder coated steel and fitted with durable nylon straps to secure the ladder in place.

posts.title: Giant Premium Chess Set
posts.content: Add a touch of fun and excitement to your dull backyard landscape with this giant premium chess set. The set comes with 32 giant pieces  – 16 white and 16 black – with the tallest piece measuring 25 inches and the pawns standing at a respectable 16 inches.

posts.title: Flex Claw Hammer
posts.content: Get the perfect angle necessary to pry any nail by using this flex claw hammer. This 2-in-1 tool comes with a magnetic nail starter for easy one handed use and features an adjustable flexible claw that you can set to four different positions.

posts.title: Donald Trump Dog Costume
posts.content: No matter what side of the political spectrum you find yourself on, everyone will agree this Donald Trump dog costume will make your pooch great again. Your furry friend will look simply dashing in his totally natural looking blonde toupe and American flag tie.

posts.title: VSSL First Aid Container
posts.content: Be prepared for any minor injury that may occur in the wild without being weighed down by placing the VSSL first aid container in your backpack. This slim 9″ x 2″ container comes packed with 17 high quality medical-grade first aid essentials.

posts.title: 24K Gold Foil Sheet Masks
posts.content: Shave a few years off your appearance by keeping your skin looking young and radiant using these 24K gold foil sheet masks. Each leaf is made from 24K edible gold sheets designed to prevent wrinkles and soothe skin.

posts.title: Darth Vader Helmet Tea Kettle
posts.content: Channel the power of the Dark Side to boil your water by pouring it into this imposing Darth Vader helmet tea kettle. Made in the likeness of Lord Vader’s iconic black helmet, it features a sturdy stainless steel construction and is complemented by a lightsaber hilt handle.
